Question
========

Suppose it is given that for a given patient population, the hemoglobin (Hb) level is normally distributed with μ = 11.9 and σ = 0.5. We randomly draw one person from this population. How high should the Hb of this person be at most to belong to the lowest 15% of the population? belong?

Answerlist
----------

* 10.7229
* 11.3818
* 11.5143
* 12.3138

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 10.7229: Incorrect
* 11.3818: Correct
* 11.5143: Incorrect
* 12.3138: Incorrect
